  • Constructor Details

    • simulator

      public simulator​(T factory, int N, java.lang.String networkType)
      Initializes a a new simulation
      Parameters:
      factory - a dummy factory instance of special node class.
      N - the number of nodes.
      networkType - the type of simulated communication protocol. Supported communication protocols are: **tcp**, **javaRMI**, **udp**, and **mockNetwork**

      Parameters:
      allID - the IDs of type UUID for all the nodes in the cluster

    • onNewMessage

      public void onNewMessage​(java.util.UUID originID, Event msg)
      Description copied from interface: BaseNode
      A channel for a node to receive a new event from other nodes. The node will receive all the message through this method.
      Specified by:
      onNewMessage in interface BaseNode
      Parameters:
      originID - the ID of the sender node
      msg - the content of the message

    • newInstance

      public BaseNode newInstance​(java.util.UUID selfID, MiddleLayer middleLayer)
      Description copied from interface: BaseNode
      This method serves as a factory for new node instances. It is supposed to return a new instance of the special node class
      Specified by:
      newInstance in interface BaseNode
      Parameters:
      selfID - the ID of the new node
      middleLayer - communication network for the new node
      Returns:
      a new instance of the special node class

    • constantSimulation

      public void constantSimulation​(int duration)
      Used to start the simulation. It calls the onStart method for all nodes to start the simulation.
      Parameters:
      duration - duration of the simulation

    • churnSimulation

      public void churnSimulation​(long duration, BaseGenerator arrival, BaseGenerator session)
      Simulate churn based on inter-arrival time and session length
      Parameters:
      duration - duration of the simulator
      arrival - inter-arrival
      session - session length

    • getSimulatedLatency

      public int getSimulatedLatency​(java.util.UUID nodeA, java.util.UUID nodeB, boolean bidirectional)
      get the simulated delay based on the normal distribution extracted from the AWS.
      Parameters:
      nodeA - first node
      nodeB - second node
      bidirectional - True, if simulated latency from A to B is the same as from B to A
      Returns:
      new simulated latency

    • getAllID

      Returns:
      nodes' UUIDs
